name: Robocop: The 2D Platformer Game
description:
This is my first game project. Inspired by Mario, this game has most of the basic functionalities of a 2D Platformer Game. The objective is simple; Collect 30 coins without losing all your lives! 

Inspired by BornCg's Tutorials. Special thanks to Kenney.nl for Assets!

Made by Raumdeuter_007
